metadata.title: CVE-2019-16993 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In phpBB before 3.1.7-PL1, includes/acp/acp_bbcodes.php has improperverification of a CSRF token on the BBCode page in the AdministrationControl Panel. An actual CSRF attack is possible if an attacker alsomanages to retrieve the session id of a reauthenticated administrator priorto targeting them.

criterions.comment: phpbb3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
